title: Binlog redacting - 1st version finalization, driving contribution and piloting
body:
### Context

#8400
We need some first usable version, real world usage scenarios and contribution of well-known highly recognizable sensitive data patterns

### Goal
 - [x] https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/issues/9147
 - [x] https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/issues/9294
 - [x] contribute to Binlog Viewer step 1: https://github.com/KirillOsenkov/MSBuildStructuredLog/pull/711
 - [x] https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/issues/9295

### Nice to haves
 - [ ] contributing to Binlog Viewer step 2: add support for forward compatibility reading (once https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/pull/9307 is merged)
 - [ ] More well-known highly recognizable sensitive data patterns are supported (work with 1ES and CredScan to facilitate their contribution)
